title: This Feels
subtle: Concept (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR30L
description: How can you describe the different ways that things feel? This Feels is a charming story that introduces students to some powerful adjectives that describe how certain items feel. The adorable illustrations and repetitive text will help support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast and to connect to prior knowledge to better understand the text.
meta: dry, feels, rough, smooth, warm, wet
Connect to prior knowledge to better understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast information
Initial Sound : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
Capitalization : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words so and this

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
